attributes.action: ensure ALL NHS Nurses, HCA's and domestics earn a decent wage; like those in NHS management
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recognition of all NHS Nurses, HCA's and domestic workers who work all hours and yet receive a very basic wage - for all the dedication and hard work they put into our failing healthcare system they surely deserve a pay scale which is reflective of the fantastic job they do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
